snippet.title: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Phantom Thieves Trailer
snippet.description:
The Phantom Thieves are sure to steal your heart with their red-hot dance moves in our latest trailer for Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight!

Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight and Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight launch on PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®Vita on December 4, 2018!

Get more info and pre-order now at http://atlus.com/personadancing.
